content:
ApplicationHealthStateChunk.ServiceHealthStateChunks Property

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric.Health
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

In this Article

Gets the list of the service health state chunks that respect the input filters.

public System.Fabric.Health.ServiceHealthStateChunkList ServiceHealthStateChunks { get; }
Returns
ServiceHealthStateChunkList

The list of the service health state chunks that respect the input filters.

Remarks

By default, no children are included in results. Users can request to include some children based on desired health or other information. For example, users can request to include all services that have health state error. Regardless of filter value, all children are used to compute application aggregated health.
